pages.comment: Square is a parallelogram with equal sides. The formula of area of square is computed very simply: squared length of it's side. Or it can be computed differently: squared diameter divided by 2

content.content:
According to legend, Rome was founded in 753 BC by twin sons Romulus 
and Remus who were raised by a she-wolf.

During its twelve-century history, the Roman civilization shifted from 
a monarchy to an oligarchic republic to a immense empire.

Since then it has been continously inhabited, and, as headquaters first 
of the Roman Empire and then of the Roman Catholic Church, 
it has had an immense impact on the world

pages.question: How to compute area of square with side a and diameter d
